   d) candidates must also satisfy the UTME 
requirements.  
(xi) NDU accepts  
a) a minimum of two (2)'A' level relevant 
subjects and three (3)'O' level subjects 
including 'O' level pass in Mathematics.  
b) NCE merit in any Arts or Science subjects, 
especially Mathematics.  
(xii) OAU requires one (1) of the two (2) ‘A’ level to be 
an Arts subject.  
(xiii) OOU and EBSU require 'O' level pass in 
Mathematics.  
(xiv) SAU accepts two (2) ‘A’ level subjects to include 
Government and any other two (2) Arts subjects 
or at NCE in Government or History.  
(xv) UYO requires passes two (2) 'A' level subjects or 
ND or NCE in cognate programme/subject, at 
credit/merit level.  
  
UTME  
(i) AAUA requires 'O' level credit passes in English 
Language, Mathematics, one (1)Arts subject and 
two (2) other relevant subjects.  
(ii) BENIN requires five (5) ‘O’ level credit passes or 
five (5) Merit passes in TC II at not more than two 
(2) sittings.  Subjects should include English 
Language and any two (2) other subjects from 
Arts or Social Sciences.  At least 'O' level pass in 
Mathematics is required.  
(iii) BOWEN requires five (5) ‘O’ level credit passes to 
include English Language and any two (2) other 
subjects from Arts, Social Sciences or Sciences. 'O' 
level pass in Mathematics or Physics is required.  
(iv) BSU requires five (5) ‘O’ level credit passes in 
Social Sciences including English Language. (v) 
 EBSU requires
